name: CatLiz
description:
In this pawesome prototype of a catformer- err, platformer you play as Liz, a cat (obviously) who has to jump around, collect coins and talk to weird other cats. 

It's my first Unity project and I hope to turn into something nicer ... in the future.

Anything that looks like a bug is probably an easter egg or a secret feature I smugly hid in the code. Feel free to tell me about them!
